name: Garmvvolf
description: The Garmvvolf is a Huge monstrosity with three heads, known for its powerful bite and regeneration abilities.
memorable: Its ability to regenerate heads makes it a persistent foe in battle, creating a daunting challenge for adventurers.
goals: The Garmvvolf typically seeks to engage in aggressive combat, overpowering foes through brute strength and tactical advantages.
relations: It may be encountered with other monstrous allies, exploiting group tactics to overwhelm adventurers.
environment: Usually found in wild, untamed areas or desolate regions where it can hunt freely.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength and the ability to regenerate lost heads.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma, making it vulnerable to clever tactics and charm effects.
attacks: Deals damage with its powerful bite attacks, inflicting both piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Tripartite Howl creates a cone of poison and thunder damage, while also imposing the frightened condition on its targets.
senses: Has keen hearing and smell, granting it advantage on perception checks that rely on these senses.
skills: Possesses a passive perception of 15, allowing it to detect hidden foes effectively.
additional_information: Regenerates two heads for each lost head each turn unless damaged by fire.
Knocks enemies prone if charged and bitten during its movement.
Only one head remains alert while resting, making it difficult to ambush.
test_queries: huge multi-headed beast with poison attacks
monstrous creature that can regenerate heads
menacing beast that inflicts fear with howl
powerful adversary with keen senses and high hit points
